name: Couch Combat
description:
Couch Combat is a fun, frantic, Splitscreen FPS made specifically with PC players in mind! Easily play with up to 4 players locally using controllers.

This game has no singleplayer mode and you need at least one controller to play in splitscreen!

  • Play with 2 to 4 players in local splitscreen!
  • Quick rounds that are easy to jump in and play
  • Lots of stages and weapons
  • Customize your character with a variety of hats
  • 20 Unique, Stacking Modifiers
  • 4 Areas based off of classic movie genres like Samurai and Western

In classic mode you gain modifiers every round which stack in interesting ways and increase the levels of chaos every round! After several rounds of the game's mechanics evolving, face a massive ridiculous round at the end to determine the winner, then the modifiers reset and you can do it all over again!
